name: tsa-monorepo
description: Texas Sports Academy - Unified Monorepo with Centralized Endpoint Management

scripts.dev: npm run sync:endpoints && concurrently "npm run dev:coach" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:coach: npm run sync:endpoints && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-platform-frontend
scripts.dev:admin: npm run sync:endpoints && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-admin-frontend
scripts.dev:staging: npm run sync:endpoints:staging && concurrently "npm run dev:coach:staging" "npm run dev:admin:staging"
scripts.dev:prod: npm run sync:endpoints:prod && concurrently "npm run dev:coach:prod" "npm run dev:admin:prod"
scripts.dev:coach:staging: npm run sync:endpoints:staging && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-platform-frontend
scripts.dev:admin:staging: npm run sync:endpoints:staging && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-admin-frontend
scripts.dev:coach:prod: npm run sync:endpoints:prod && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-platform-frontend
scripts.dev:admin:prod: npm run sync:endpoints:prod && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-admin-frontend
scripts.dev:coach:dev: npm run sync:endpoints:dev && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-platform-frontend
scripts.dev:admin:dev: npm run sync:endpoints:dev && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-admin-frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:coach && npm run build:admin
scripts.test:all: npm run test:coach && npm run test:admin
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:coach && npm run lint:admin
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:prerequisites:dev && cd tsa-infrastructure && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never && npm run sync:endpoints:dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run deploy:prerequisites:staging && cd tsa-infrastructure && cdk deploy --all --context stage=staging --require-approval never && npm run sync:endpoints:staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prerequisites:prod && cd tsa-infrastructure && cdk deploy --all --context stage=prod --require-approval never && npm run sync:endpoints:prod
scripts.deploy:prerequisites:dev: echo '🚀 Starting dev deployment prerequisites...' && echo '✅ Dev prerequisites complete'
scripts.deploy:prerequisites:staging: npm run install:infra && npm run cdk:bootstrap:staging && echo '✅ Staging prerequisites complete'
scripts.deploy:prerequisites:prod: npm run install:infra && npm run cdk:bootstrap:prod && echo '✅ Production prerequisites complete'
scripts.install:infra: cd tsa-infrastructure && npm install -g aws-cdk && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:coach && npm run clean:admin && npm run clean:infra
scripts.install:services: cd tsa-platform-frontend && npm install && cd ../tsa-admin-frontend && npm install && cd ../tsa-coach-backend && npm install
scripts.bootstrap: npm run install:all && npm run sync:endpoints && npm run build:all
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run sync:endpoints && echo '🎉 Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development'
scripts.env:setup: echo '📋 Setting up environment file...' && cp .env.example .env && echo '✅ Created .env from .env.example' && echo '⚠️  Remember to replace placeholder values with real API keys!'
